column1: Sergiyev Posad grew in the 15th century around one of the greatest of Russian monasteries
column2: the Trinity Lavra established by St. Sergius of Radonezh
column3: still (as of 2015) one of the largest monasteries in Russia. Town status was granted to Sergiyev Posad in 1742. The town's name
column5: has strong religious connotations. Soviet authorities changed it first to just Sergiyev in 1919
column7: in memory of the revolutionary Vladimir Mikhailovich Zagorsky .Sergiyev Posad was penetrated by Germany in 1941.
